QuestData.Title: Harbingers of the Void
QuestData.Description: Our scouts have made a horrifying discovery, $n.$B$BThe souls of the prisoners are being used to summon creatures from the void.$B$BInside, three beings of darkness already await - the Essence of Shadow, the Essence of Darkness, and the Essence of Anguish.$B$BThey must be destroyed immediately, before their power can be unleashed.
QuestData.LogDescription: Destroy the Essence of Shadow, Essence of Darkness, and Essence of Anguish.
QuestData.RewardText: I knew I could trust this task to you, $n.
